body_html:
I have some preference for making this a contrib/hooks project. I think the hooks should probably live in the directory python/training once it's in core, next to MonitoredSession.

So, the path to use would be: contrib/hooks/python/training/profiler_hook.py. I think we want to have one file per hook in the end, so no need to use basic_run_hook.py.
body_text:
I have some preference for making this a contrib/hooks project. I think the hooks should probably live in the directory python/training once it's in core, next to MonitoredSession.
So, the path to use would be: contrib/hooks/python/training/profiler_hook.py. I think we want to have one file per hook in the end, so no need to use basic_run_hook.py.
body:
I have some preference for making this a `contrib/hooks` project. I think the hooks should probably live in the directory `python/training` once it's in core, next to `MonitoredSession`.

So, the path to use would be: `contrib/hooks/python/training/profiler_hook.py`. I think we want to have one file per hook in the end, so no need to use `basic_run_hook.py`.
